function.name: dryingTime_decrease
function.description: This function is used to reduce the operating time of the dryer.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to reduce the drying time.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to reduce the drying time.

dryingTimer.description: The amount of time in minutes to reduce the drying timer.
